verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
For forty days in full array we heard the giant cry,
Cursing God and God's own men who stood there terrified,
Until we saw the Mighty One cut off the giant's head,
And then we knew the battle won whatever lay ahead.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Day to day we find our flesh oppose us to our face -
Threatening to overwhelm and take God's rightful place.
But our Old Man was crucified with Christ on Calvary!
Arise, O Church, and shout in praise, and claim His victory!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
When we believe, it doesn't matter how the battle seems,
For we believe that Jesus Christ has won the victory.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Praise the Lord! The Mighty One is King!
Firmly seated on the throne as Lord of everything!
As yet we hope but do not see all things beneth His feet,
But we proclaim until that day His victory's complete!
